text: Had several issues with the Dell Inspiron 7000 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop | Intel i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 | 16GB RAM | 1TB and 8GB Hybrid Hard Drive | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 since day one. blue screens occasionally and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the Dell Inspiron 7000 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop | Intel i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 | 16GB RAM | 1TB and 8GB Hybrid Hard Drive | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the battery life feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the Dell Inspiron 7000 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop | Intel i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 | 16GB RAM | 1TB and 8GB Hybrid Hard Drive | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10 if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the Dell Inspiron 7000 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop | Intel i5-7300HQ Quad-Core | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 | 16GB RAM | 1TB and 8GB Hybrid Hard Drive | Backlit Keyboard | Windows 10. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.
